solution_line_template: The taxi charge for a distance of {distance_miles} miles is {distance_miles} x ${charge_per_mile} = $<<{distance_miles}*{charge_per_mile}={taxi_charge_for_distance}>>{taxi_charge_for_distance}.
The total amount that Michelle paid for the ride was ${ride_fee} + ${taxi_charge_for_distance} = $<<{ride_fee}+{taxi_charge_for_distance}={total_payment}>>{total_payment}.
